title: RNCircus, Fallwell All Well? 8.26.20
itunes:title: RNCircus, Fallwell All Well? 8.26.20
description:
In episode 702, Jack and Miles are joined by comedian and Grown Local podcast co-host Billy Wayne Davis to discuss the RNC speeches, Jerry Falwell Jr. and his wife's affair with a business partner, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. WATCH: Kimberly Guilfoyle’s full speech at the Republican National Convention | 2020 RNC Night 1
  2. St. Louis Couple Who Aimed AR-15 at Black Protestors Stir Fear at RNC With Bleak Picture of America
  3. Florida Rep. Matt Gaetz uses RNC speech to spread conspiracies and claim Democrats will 'disarm you, empty the prisons, lock you in your home, and invite MS-13 to live next door'
  4. Melania Trump aims RNC speech at erasing memories of 2016
  5. Business partner of Falwells says affair with evangelical power couple spanned seven years
  6. Jerry Falwell Jr. And A Young Pool Attendant Launched A Business That Sparked A Bitter Dispute
  7. Exclusive: Trump fixer Cohen says he helped Falwell handle racy photos
  8. Exclusive: Falwell steered Liberty University land deal benefiting his personal trainer
  9. WATCH: King Princess - Hit the Back (Official Audio)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
